channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed

item.title: Amazon's Cyber Monday sale is almost over –here are 121 deals I'm shopping on AirPods, Kindle, TVs, and more

item.title: This obscure company could’ve taken the storage market by storm – but building commercially viable holographic storage was simply a bridge too far
item.description: InPhase Technologies could've taken the storage market by storm, but it just couldn't get a solid working product.

item.title: These great Cyber Monday tech deals will likely be gone tomorrow
item.description: December is kicking off with a bang. Cyber Monday is today, and it’s one of your last chances to score major deals before the holiday rush plows us all over. It’s a great moment to snag gadgets — many of which have been tested by The Verge — at (or close to) all-time lows if […]

item.title: I've tested Peloton and loved it, but it was too expensive for me – until the Cyber Monday deals broke the cycle
item.description: Peloton Cross Training Bikes and Tread just hit their lowest-ever prices in the Cyber Monday sales.

item.title: OpenAI just made another circular deal
item.description: OpenAI announced an ownership stake in the private equity investment firm Thrive Holdings, whose parent company, Thrive Capital, is one of the main investors in, you guessed it, OpenAI. While OpenAI did not spend money on the ownership stake, according to an anonymous source cited by The Financial Times, the company announced it would provide […]

item.title: AI actors horrify James Cameron and he wants no part of it
item.description: James Cameron is pushing back hard against the rise of AI-generated actors like Tilly Norwood, calling them a threat to the soul of cinema.

item.title: We found 25 great laptop deals you can still grab for Cyber Monday

In fact, not only can you still save hundreds on great notebooks from Microsoft, Apple, Razer, HP, and more, but we’ve got some new accessory deals worth checking out. If […]

item.description: The Apple Watch Ultra 2 is Apple's biggest watch, but it's now at its smallest price ever.

item.title: Horror Dreams Come True: Sam Raimi and Jordan Peele Are Collaborating
item.description: The 'Evil Dead' legend and the 'Get Out' Oscar winner will co-produce a feature directed by newcomer Dylan Clark.

item.description: Of all the Airwrap dupes I've tested, this is my favorite – and it'd make the perfect holiday gift with this mega discount.

item.title: Zillow drops climate risk scores after agents complained of lost sales
item.description: The move is a loss for homebuyers, who through Zillow had ready access to a property's climate risk scores from First Street.

item.title: Apple : après le fiasco de Siri, le grand patron de l’IA quitte son poste
item.description: Plus grand monde ne donnait cher de sa peau après le fiasco Siri. C'est désormais officiel : John Giannandrea, le grand patron de l'IA chez Apple, quitte son poste. Dans la foulée, le constructeur réorganise sa division qui avait déjà été dépecée suite à la crise interne provoquée par le report des fonctions d'Apple Intelligence pour Siri.

item.title: Apple AI chief steps down following Siri setbacks
item.description: Apple AI chief John Giannandrea is stepping down from his position, according to an announcement on Monday. The change comes as Apple struggles to get its AI-powered Siri back on track after delaying its launch earlier this year. Now, Amar Subramanya will serve as Apple’s vice president of AI. Subramanya spent 16 years at Google […]

item.title: The best earbuds I heard in 2025 just crashed to an even lower price for Cyber Monday –elbows out for Technics!
item.description: Technics' excellent EAH-AZ100 simply can't be bettered when it comes to audio quality, and at this all-new, even lower price (better than Black Friday), there's no better time if it's got to be the best…

item.title: The hidden cost of cloud centralization
item.description: Architect for failure and you’ll build resilience into your system. When AWS’s US-East-1 region went dark in late October, followed just a week later by a Microsoft Azure outage, it was yet another stark reminder that even the world’s biggest cloud vendors are not immune to failures. A simple DNS failure in AWS’s Route 53 rippled outward, knocking out applications, disrupting database services, and reminding us how dependent our tech infrastructure has become on a handful of cloud regions. With “an inadvertent tenant configuration change,” the Azure outage further highlighted the instability ...

item.title: Winter Kicks Off With Back-to-Back Arctic Blasts and a Potential Bomb Cyclone
item.description: Frigid temps and heavy snow gripped much of the U.S. on December 1, the first day of meteorological winter. It looks like these bitter conditions are here to stay.
